title: (Pwn2Own) Apple iOS mediaserverd crte Out-Of-Bounds Access Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations of Apple iOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of crte messages within the mediaserverd service. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a memory access past the end of an allocated object. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/kb/HT201222
timeline:
2018-11-15 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-01-24 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2019-06-14 - Advisory Updated
